resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Brother 致旺 returned home on a flying visit this morning. 5 1/2 p.m. with wife, 文姬, Miss Kim Melissa and 光鉉 went to the Wha-Shin Department Store Restaurant to see Jung Bong Sup(鄭鳳燮) a young man who has been recommended to us as a possible candidate for a son-in-law. He is a graduate of the Gov. Med. School and is now an intern in the Government Hospital. We liked his exterior appearance. He is very highly spoken of by his former teacher, Mr. 朴永彬.
resource.chars: Brother 致旺 returned home on a flying visit this morning. 5 1/2 p.m. with wife, 文姬, Miss Kim Melissa and 光鉉 went to the Wha-Shin Department Store Restaurant to see Jung Bong Sup(鄭鳳燮) a young man who has been recommended to us as a possible candidate for a son-in-law. He is a graduate of the Gov. Med. School and is now an intern in the Government Hospital. We liked his exterior appearance. He is very highly spoken of by his former teacher, Mr. 朴永彬.
